lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton’s second presidential bid seems to amount to a series of high-dollar fund-raisers with public appearances added to the schedule when they can be fit in.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and JONATHAN MARTIN

headline.print_headline: Clinton Uses Access to Woo the Ultrarich
headline.main: Where Has Hillary Clinton Been? Ask the Ultrarich

snippet: Mrs. Clinton’s second presidential bid seems to amount to a series of high-dollar fund-raisers with public appearances added to the schedule when they can be fit in....
abstract: Hillary Clinton has aggressively courted moneyed donors over course of summer, appearing at events and benefits in nation's most moneyed enclaves; campaign raised about $143 million in August, its best month to date; while Clinton has made broad effort to appeal to ordinary voters, her appearances before them are largely scheduled between events catering to elite and longtime donors, among whom she appears most comfortable.
